titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Betty L. Hutchinson papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: House parent at the University of Michigan's J. Raleigh Nelson International House in 1953-1954. Nelson House was located at 915 Oakland Avenue, and named to honor the founder of the International Center on campus.
archdesc.scopecontent: Nelson House News (No.1, 1955), photographs, and correspondence with former international students and visitors to the Nelson House during Hutchinson's tenure as house parent.
